title: Crazy Kind of Love
writer: Karen McCullah (screenplay), April Stevens (based on the novel "Angel Angel" by), Karen McCullah
actors: Virginia Madsen, Graham Rogers, Amanda Crew, Zach Gilford
plot: While re-evaluating her life as a newly single mother, a woman relies on her carefree son and his awkward brother to keep their lives interesting. When an unlikely romance blossoms between the youngest son and the new girl in town, she realizes the key to her happiness can be found where she least expects it, and there's only one kind of love worth living for - the crazy kind.
